title: NFL Week 7 Fantasy, DFS, Gambling with Heath Cummings and Stephen Oh (Football 10/18)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports Sr. Fantasy Analyst Heath Cummings to take a look at the Thursday Night game between the Cardinals and the Broncos (Christian Kirk is a sleeper??), then the guys dive into some streaming options for Week 7 at the QB position, whether to sell high on Julian Edelman and Mike Evans, what's happening with the Atlanta running back situation and much more. Then Stephen Oh of SportsLine joins the show to take a look at why Blake Bortles might be in for a big game, if you should be scared of starting your Saints and some over unders to bet on.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
